text: Omid Fouladivanda (; born 28 February 1977 in Gachsaran) is an international volleyball referee from Iran. Fouladivanda has an international referee certificate from Europe. He is also the first and youngest international referee of Iran in 2009 from Bucharest , Romania has obtained its certificate. He has been refereeing in the Premier League of Iran since 2006 and has also refereed in the Premier League of Sitting Volleyball since 2010. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Referees Category:Iranian people
title: Omid Fouladivanda
